```{r message=FALSE, echo=FALSE}
library("magrittr")
library("ggplot2")

cranlogs::cran_downloads(package = c("mlr", "mlrMBO", "mlrCPO", "mlr3",
  "mlr3pipelines", "caret"), from = "2012-01-01", to = "2019-10-01") %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = date, y = count)) +
  geom_smooth(se = FALSE, size = 0.5) +
  facet_wrap(~package, scales = "free_y") +
  labs(title = "Daily CRAN downloads from RStudio mirror",
    subtitle = "Data query via package 'cranlogs'.") +
  theme_minimal()
```

```{r message=FALSE, echo=FALSE}
library("magrittr")
library("ggplot2")
library("dplyr")

cranlogs::cran_downloads(package = c("mlr", "mlrMBO", "mlrCPO", "mlr3",
  "mlr3pipelines", "caret"), from = "2012-01-01", 
  to = "2019-10-01") %>%
  mutate(dategroup = lubridate::floor_date(date, "1 month")) %>% 
  group_by(dategroup, package) %>% 
  summarise(dl_m = sum(count)) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = dategroup, y = dl_m)) +
  geom_smooth(se = FALSE, size = 0.5) +
  facet_wrap(~package, scales = "free_y") +
  labs(title = "Monthly CRAN downloads from RStudio mirror",
    subtitle = "Data query via package 'cranlogs'.",
    y = "count", x = "date") +
  theme_minimal()
```
